name: Agriculture vs Aliens 2
description:
Your farm is being attacked by Aliens! And you have nothing else but a bow and your crops to defend your prized cows. Can you defend your farm against increasingly difficult waves of aliens?

To play, open the .zip folder, select the version of windows you are running, and open 'Agriculture_vs_Aliens 2.exe

This is the sequel to a game I worked on for a gamejam back in 2018, hope you enjoy!
